text: Lantana camara or Spanish flag is a hairy shrub native from tropical America. It is regarded as a notorious weed, and popular ornamental garden plant in many parts of the world. ==References== ==Other websites== *Flora of China *Presence of two types of ﬂowers with respect to nectar sugar in two gregariously ﬂowering species * Medicinal uses Category:Shrubs Category:Verbenaceae
title: Lantana camara
